name: Napa Valley Museum
description: Nonprofit museum offering exhibitions and programs on art, nature, and history since 1972. Free for Yountville Veterans Home residents and active military.
fullDescription: Nonprofit museum offering exhibitions and programs on art, nature, and history since 1972. Free for Yountville Veterans Home residents and active military.
keywords: Napa Valley Museum, Yountville, Napa County, art, nature, history, veterans free, military free, wine country
